items.title: Number of Islands
items.description: A tool used to identify the number and location of distinct islands in geospatial imagery. Includes a visualization comparing different traversal algorithms.

items.title: SiteStall
items.description: A Firefox extension that improves concentration. A modern implementation of Dr. Richard Patterson"s ideal 'commitment device'.

items.title: GeoSpatial Visualization
items.description: A geospatial visualization of Iceland. Rendered with VisIt, automated with Python, video processed with FFmpeg. Available on Youtube.

items.title: DiscoverDaily
items.description: A Spotify Recommender System. Trains a Classifier on your musical tastes and recommends songs daily. Uses the Spotify API and scikit-learn for machine learning.

items.title: PriceDrop
items.description: Compares current deals for an amazon product to historic prices and notifies you in case of a good deal. Uses BeautifulSoup, SQLite, and SMTPlib for email notifications.

items.title: BudgetVis
items.description: A tool for visualizing your budget. Written in JavaScript with jQuery and D3.js.

items.title: Blue
items.description: A polyphonic MIDI audio synthesizer. Written with the JUCE audio framework.
